name: mapas-zonas
description: Generates geoJSON and topoJSON files containing shapes for Brazil's electoral zones and municipalities

scripts.postinstall: if [ ! -d "./municipal-brazilian-geodata/data" ]; then git clone git://github.com/luizpedone/municipal-brazilian-geodata ; else echo "municipal-brazilian-geodata has already been loaded. To reload from GitHub, please remove directory ./municipal-brazilian-geodata and run npm install again" ; fi

author: Fabio Cereda
